Classes

struct  WirePort
 Equals the spirit:wirePort element in IP-Xact specification. More...

Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:wire in IP-Xact specification under the abstractionDefinition element.

Represents a port that carries logic values or an array of logic values.

Definition at line 22 of file wireabstraction.h.
